valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 15 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 16 Nov 2025

Showers, becoming wintry later.

German Bight.text:
Wind
In north, easterly backing northerly 4 or 5, backing northwesterly 5 or 6 later. In south, easterly backing northeasterly 4 to 6, backing northerly or northwesterly 4 or 5 later.
Sea state
Slight or moderate, becoming rough later in far north.
Weather
In north, showers, mainly later. In south, occasional rain, then showers later.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally moderate later. In south, good, occasionally moderate.
